categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: A Human male known only as the Prophet of Vodal Kressh led the army of Vodal Kressh's followers on the planet of Athiss during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Around 3643 BBY he was killed by a strike team sent to investigate the ruins on the planet. He was particularly strong in Force and was capable of the rare Force ability of Pyrokinesis.
